replies.body:
Alright here we go,

People that play regulary on Avicus are scared of changes. And I can understand that, no one really enjoy changes, not even I. You find these maps funny, enjoyable and they have always been there for you.
  But Avicus and their maps will never, never improve if Avicus isn't ready to take the step and remove the maps that have poor gameplay. Terino have very poor gameplay, it's skybridge based, crafting armour is a pain in the butt, the amount of space you get could only work if it was competetive and the monuments were literally the most stupid thing ever to defend (The platforms were small and extremely far away).

I will probably get a lot of hate for this, but I was the one bringing it up that Terino shouldn't be a map on Avicus anymore, because I didn't find it enjoyble. But I also knew that people loved the map, therefor I came with the suggestion to have a nostalgia server that had the communitys old favorites which isn't really that gameplay based. The nostal rotation could like come back for one week every month or something and it would get the community hyped.

Nebula is kinda the same thing nowdays, get on, desotry the monument, killfarm, and get credits. It isnt really more than that. That's why tournament are important. With tournaments, players like me will stay, but with the fact that the tournament is competetive and some teams take it very seriously, we want good maps with "based gameplay" and "no biased favorite maps". I really hope you can understand that. 

When I was a mapdev, we had an reassassment, where every mapdev could put a vote and an opinion on a map. 95% of the maps I rated had the "red" colour, which means I thought it should get removed. And I still stand for that decision. I really do think Avicus needs to improve their maps, and their YML features, which I know (hopefully) kylo and javi is doing.

I guess that's it. Probably got some misspells but idc tbh, if you didnt understand a centense or something just ask.
